name: Yannick S.
about: Hi, Iâ€™m Yannick, 38, a chub/bear from the south of Luxembourg. Iâ€™m a Graphic Designer, Podcaster, and Movie Buff. I enjoy good food, quality time on the couch, and I love the Luxembourgish lifestyle.
motivation: I want to be Mister Bear to show that everything is possible. Many people donâ€™t see themselves fitting into a niche or group, and I want them to know that itâ€™s okay to be different. I know what itâ€™s like to feel alone and unseen, but the bear community changed that for me with its open arms. Now I want to show others that even when they feel alone, thereâ€™s always a community ready to welcome and support them.

name: Robert E.
about: I'm  56 years old, I'm a proud father and grandfather. My coming out was in 2007. The last 17 years i was living in a partnership in Merzig/Germany. In 2025,i moved back to the north of Luxembourg
motivation: I want to be Mr Bear, to be a strong partner for the bear and whole LGBTQIA+ community during these increasingly strong homophobic currents. In the position of Mr Bear , i want to improve the contacts on local and International Bear and LGBTQIA+ Organisations

name: Yannick K.
